data.text: @latimeralder It's all to do with money for Boris Johnsons friends. Remember we have not qualified if any of the unusable ppe even exists. https://t.co/zmbVrFYW5I
@latimeralder I’d be interested in a comparison of say 2017-2019 but substituting Covid for flu
@latimeralder Understand statistics?! You don’t even know not to use 3-D on pie-charts- an Elementary error !

@latimeralder You catch a cold and stay at home for two days - cost to your employer 2 man days. What would be the cost in man days from infected colleagues if you hadn't stayed at home - 0, 4, 6, 8? Who knows?
@GowTolson Then how can you learn for next time?
@latimeralder We can estimate the costs resulting from the measures taken, but we cannot estimate the costs if they were not taken. That is the point.
